headline: Netflix Warner Bros Deal Weighs On Valuation Antitrust And Execution Risk
summary: Netflix, ticker NasdaqGS:NFLX, has proposed an all cash acquisition of Warner Bros. Discovery valued at about US$83b. The offer has attracted competing interest from Paramount, turning the deal into a multi party bidding process. Regulators in the U.S. and UK are reviewing potential antitrust issues tied to the combination. Upcoming Senate hearings are set to add political scrutiny to what would be one of the largest media mergers in recent years. Netflix operates a global streaming...
